name: ai_debate_bridge
description: MCP tools that coordinate Codex and ClaudeCode debate sessions.

tools.name: start_debate
tools.description: Start a new debate session between Codex and ClaudeCode using the provided initial prompt.

tools.name: step
tools.description: Advance the debate using the decision about which approach to follow.

tools.name: stop
tools.description: Stop the current debate session and clear state.
